Package hesml.benchmarks.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBenchmark
    This class defines a collection of common functions for all the similarity benchmarks.
    BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModelMeasures
    This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of corpus-based IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.
    BenchmarkCrossCorpusICModels
    This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of corpus-based IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.
    BenchmarkCrossICModelMeasures
    This class implements a set of cross-validation benchmarks by computing the correlation values for the experimental matrix defined by the Cartesian product of a set of intrinsic IC models versus a set of IC-based similarity measures.
    BenchmarkFactory
    The main aim of this class is to instantiate all the benchmarks in order to hide them to the client code.
    BenchmarkMultipleDatasets
    This class implements a set of benchmarks of specific similarity measures (rows) with different datasets and WordNet versions (columns).
    BenchmarkNonICMultiMeasures
    This class implements a set of word similarity benchmarks for all similarity measures which are not based on an IC model.
    BenchmarkSingleICmeasure
    This class evaluates one single IC-based similarity measure with a collection of intrinsic IC models and returns the matrix of Pearson correlation values.
    BenchmarkSingleNonICMeasure
    This class implements a set of word similarity benchmarks for a single non IC-based similarity measure.
    BenchmarkSynsetsInfo
    The aim of this class is to generate the Synset pair info files included in our WNSimRep dataset.
    WordNetSimBenchmark
    This class implements the common functions for all the word similarity benchmarks based on WordNet.
    WordPairSimilarity
    This class encapsulates two words and their baseline similarity.
